room_title: Escape room "Saving Lincoln" by House of Conundrum in Omaha
review: I went with a group of friends. We had to re-schedule our room and time the same day. John was very accommodating and was able to switch with no hiccups! Saving Lincoln was a great room to escape from. We will be trying other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Saving Lincoln" by House of Conundrum in Omaha
review: We had so much fun! The people that were working the day we booked the Saving Lincoln room were super fun, personable, and made the entire experience worthwhile! This was my first experience at any sort of escape room and I will definitely be returning!

room_title: Escape room "Saving Lincoln" by House of Conundrum in Omaha
review: This was our first time doing an escape room and we loved it! Our group was 3 adults and a child, so we did the Abraham Lincoln one. Since it was historically-based, some of the clues were a little difficult, but we made it out with 7 minutes left on the clock and only used 2 hints. We will definitely come back again for the Bat Cave one!

room_title: Escape room "Saving Lincoln" by House of Conundrum in Omaha
review: Did this as a family activity for my dad's birthday and had so much fun! The staff was so nice and we were already planning our next visit as soon as we finished our puzzle. We did the Saving Lincoln room. Sorry, President Lincoln, we didn't quite save you.

room_title: Escape room "Saving Lincoln" by House of Conundrum in Omaha
review: We had the best time “Saving Lincoln”! Will definitely be going back!
